meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Discussion and approval of the minutes
Ethics Disclosures
agenda_items.description: Board members should disclose any relationship a member may have with the projects to be considered on this agenda.

agenda_items.title: Discussion regarding the demolition of the facility
agenda_items.description: at 9999 Technology Blvd and Resolution authorizing the Park at Northpoint Apartments transaction.

agenda_items.title: Discussion and approval of a resolution
agenda_items.description: authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for the Burnett Lofts.
agenda_items.presenter: Sam McDaniel; Jim Plummer; Braxton Parsons

agenda_items.title: Discussion and approval of the creation of a subcommittee
agenda_items.description: with the purpose of hiring staff to assist the Board with business operations.

agenda_items.title: Ethics Presentation
agenda_items.description: Presentation regarding board and commission ethics regulations.

agenda_items.title: Discussion regarding proposed changes to the DPFC Bylaws
Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Website Report
Discussion regarding Texas Attorney General Texas Public Information Act
agenda_items.description: and Open Meetings Act online training.

agenda_items.title: Discussion and review of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
